title: cqm89
author: cqm89
content: Just sharing this new index to track the crypto market conditions:- https://twitter.com/crypto_ewi

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: cqm89 on December 07, 2023, 06:39:57 AMJust sharing this new index to track the crypto market conditions:- https://twitter.com/crypto_ewihave you used it? is the index they offer better compared to other accounts? or how? i see the account is very new and it doesn't seem credible at all.

comments.author: cqm89
comments.body: Thanks for the questions. I encourage you to visit the account description where you'll find a GitHub link to the repository, where there are comprehensive details, explanations, and the rationale behind the index. This index is distinctive because it captures a holistic view of the crypto market by encompassing a wide variety of tokens, beyond just Bitcoin and Ethereum-based tokens. The account is newly established because it was just recently that the author decided to open it. The creator wanted a separate account solely for sharing this resource. Importantly, there is no monetary solicitation involved; the index has been the creatorâ€™s personal tool for crypto investment for over four years and is now being offered openly and free of charge, with the hope that it may benefit others.
